title: Looking at NSFW content at work - Cloudflare 1.1.1.1 For Families
description: We got James to browse the internet to whatever he wants, as long as he's testing out Cloudflare's 1.1.1.1 for Family that automatically blocks Malware and Adult Content. Does it work?
